abstract: AbbVie reports its all-pill hepatitis C combo treatment has been approved for patients in the 28 European Union member countries.
lead_paragraph: The drug maker AbbVie said that its new, all-pill hepatitis C combo treatment had been approved for patients in the 28 European Union member countries.
snippet: The drug maker AbbVie said that its new, all-pill hepatitis C combo treatment had been approved for patients in the 28 European Union member countries.

headline.main: European Union Approves Hepatitis C Treatment
headline.print_headline: European Union Approves Hepatitis C Treatment
